Pre-Game Insights: The Philadelphia 76ers (2-7) are set to meet the New York Knicks (4-5) on Tuesday.
Both teams are coming off losses, with the Sixers losing to Charlotte and the Knicks to Indiana.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is the first 76ers Cup Night presented by Chick-fil-A.
It is the front end of a back-to-back for both clubs, with the Knicks hosting Chicago and the Sixers set to host the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday.
Others: Jared McCain scored a career-high 27 points for the Sixers against Charlotte.
Caleb Martin recorded the sixth four-steal game of his NBA career for the Sixers on Sunday night against Charlotte.
